text:
Hey there :wave:
Is there any update on documentation regarding icons?
I know it’s not on top of the list. But still appreciate additional info on how icon tag and icon field work especially in terms of the theme. Currently, working on the module for a theme and it looks I’m not getting it right for now :smile:

Thanks!
I think the docs were just updated regarding this

Thanks <@UQERM7BLY>
Yeah, there are a few lines about icon but not much actually.

Hey Kevin - I just pushed a fix for this to Prod. You'll need to republish CSS files to see the effect take action (adding a space and publishing should be enough, or if you send me pages you're seeing issues on I can take care of it). Thanks for the patience here! Let me know if you see any continued issues
<@UKHNRHVC7> Awesome! Thank you so much for the follow up on this. <@U016CP4G7T7> thanks for crushing this serious bug. I appreciate it!

Hey there Olia. The easiest way to get the icon values at the moment would be to use the module editor in the Design manager, then use the copy json button to get the values - if you’re working locally.

That way you can pick the icon using UI.

We realize that’s not ideal and aim to make it easier to do fully locally but it is not a quick fix.
